title: FTSE 100 LIVE: Markets higher as US-UK trade deal comes into force
description: The deal lays out rules for imports and exports of cars and aerospace parts, reducing levies.
content:
The FTSE 100 (^FTSE) and European stocks moved higher on the last day of the first half of the year, as the UK's deal trade deal with the US came into force.
The deal saw tariffs set at 10% for auto… [+7851 chars]
